title: Wish I could rate it ZERO
review:
Bad acting = check
Poor directing = check
Poor writing = check
Lots of false reviews = check
No plot = check
Zero entertainment value = check
Just plain stupidity = check
Worse movie you'll probably ever see = checkIT'S BEING TOO KIND TO RATE THE SLOP A ONE.
So I'm rating it ZERO

title: High reviews had their rating planted.
review: High reviews had their 10 rating planted into their head that this was actually a good movie. Since i had't much sleep in the last few days..... I saw this movie for what it actually is. Completely noisy trash that contained slow motion special effects as its only redeeming quality.
